Headline: #53A South Pulaski Temporary Reroute at 111th/Pulaski
ShortDescription: 53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted via Pulaski, 111th, Kedzie, 107th and Pulaski due to, street blockage near 111th/Pulaski.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#53A South Pulaski buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Pulaski, 111th, Kedzie, 107th and Pulaski due to, street blockage near 111th/Pulaski.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #111 111th/King Drive Temporary Reroute near 111th/Western
ShortDescription: 111 111th/King Drive buses temp. rerouted WB: 111th, Ashland, 115th and Marshfield; EB: 115th, Ashland and 111th due to, street blockage near 111th/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#111 111th/King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due tostreet blockage near 111th/Western.

Westbound buses will operate via 111th, Ashland, 115th and Marshfield.

Eastbound buses will operate via 115th, Ashland and 111th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute near 111th/Western
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses temp. rerouted WB: 115th, Ashland, 112th, Marshfield and 115th; EB: Marshfield and 115th due to, street blockage near 111th/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to street blockage near 111th/Western.

Westbound buses will operate via 115th, Ashland, 112th, Marshfield and 115th.

Eastbound buses will operate via Marshfield and 115th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed at UIC/Halsted
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to a mechanical problem on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing at UIC/Halsted due to a mechanical problem on a train.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
